title: Connecticut Driving Test Download
text: Serious about passing The DMV theory test ? Practice this super realistic 300 question driving theory test to prepare for your 2013-2014 DMV multiple choice test. Definitely a much more fun way to learn than reading the driver manual. Rehearsing the test from your mobile phone at your convenience can save you from any negative surprises through the test. Take this latest mock theory test to boost your confidence for DMV exam. The app is excellent for studying as well as rehearsing.You can expect a clear understanding of the following topics from the practice questions here Traffic ControlIntersections and TurnsPassingParallel ParkingDefensive DrivingAlcohol and Other DrugsSpecial Driving ConditionsSharing the RoadRoad SignsYou can practice with two modes - Study time and time challenge.Study time -lets you practice till you learn, scrolling back and forth through the questions, without any restriction.Time challenge mode- restricts your time, as in the real test.A graphical representation of your progress is also available in the app.
description: Serious about passing The DMV theory test ? Practice this super realistic 300 question driving theory test to prepare for your 2013-2014 DMV
